__hb_format_t Struct Reference

#include <hb_parser.h>


Data Fields

size_t count
char type
size_t field_width
size_t params [2]

Detailed Description

Every Harwell-Boeing format string has at least a count and a field width. It may have at most two additional parameters after that:

For fixed formats, digits after decimal point; For integer formats, minimum number of digits in the number (defaults to zero, which means no particular number (???)); For float formats, significand width and exponent width.
